heading: Peak District
subheading: One of the advantages of React is that you can quickly generate HTML chunks using the JSX template system.

images.title: Setting off
images.description: Entering the Peak District around 1 mile south of Glossop. The gentle ascent rewards you early on with beautiful scenery - it's not long until the road is out of sight and there's nothing but open space and nature surrounding you.

images.title: Time to get your feet wet
images.description: Every couple hundred meters, erosion under the pathway has claimed a few more slabs of stone; each little detour a chilly reminder that the running shoes might not be cut out for what's ahead.

images.title: A surprise by the path
images.description: Remains of a B-24 Liberator that crashed during a training flight with 2 on board and no serious injuries to either. The mud is quickly reclaiming the remains - comparing the present to photos found online, almost half of the previously visible debris sunk in the past few years.

images.title: Kinder Scout
images.description: And it's ALDI middle aisle cousin in the foreground.

images.title: Personal highlight
images.description: I wasn't expecting much water on our route, but heavy rain left plenty of a beautiful sight hidden at the top of a steep hill.

images.title: Would you believe...
images.description: ...that this is where I felt thirst for the first time on the hike?
